articles.author: Rockstar Games
articles.title: A Message from Rockstar Games - Rockstar Games
articles.description: Next month marks the 25th anniversary of Rockstar Games. Thanks to the incredible support of our players worldwide, we have had the opportunity to create games we are truly passionate about — without you, none of this would be possible, and we are so...

articles.author: Liam Doolan
articles.title: Nintendo's 330M+ User Accounts Will Be Foundation Of "Lasting Relationship With Consumers" - Nintendo Life
articles.content:
@GameOtaku@Don Im not the choir, Id much rather have a VC than NSO locked Nes/SNES/etc titles, but it is what it is. I was simply stating why it exists in the fashion it does.
And yes, Xbox and Sony… [+1822 chars]
